name: taskpresso
description: Build and Deployment Configuration for Taskpresso React client

scripts.build:client: npm run install:client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run clean && npm run build:client && npm run deploy:prepare
scripts.test:prepare: npm run test:server:stop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:reset db:prepare && npm install
scripts.test:server:start: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails s -p 3003 -d --pid tmp/pids/server_test.pid
scripts.test:server:stop: if [ -f tmp/pids/server_test.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat tmp/pids/server_test.pid) 2>/dev/null; then kill -9 $(cat tmp/pids/server_test.pid) && rm tmp/pids/server_test.pid; fi
scripts.e2e:tests: npm run clean && npm run build:client && npm run deploy:prepare && npm run test:prepare && npm run test:server:start && npm run test:run

author: RaifCerveny
